This tank is really great for yoga. I wear it frequently. It is great for moving and staying cool. The band at the bottom is not too thick so it helps to keep the tank from gapping during various poses. So far, I have only worn it for yoga but come summer, I would definitely wear it with shorts. It could definitely work as a layering piece under a sweater or jacket. I really recommend it. My usual size is large and that is what I ordered.
